titles.title: Legal Benefits Tax Fairness Act of 2005

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore and make permanent the exclusion from gross income for amounts received under qualified group legal services plans and to repeal the limitation on the amount of the exclusion.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/10/2005--Introduced. Legal Benefits Tax Fairness Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restore, make permanent, and eliminate the dollar limitation for the tax exclusion for amounts received under a qualified group legal services plan.
